articles.title: UK government plans further nuclear power expansion - BBC.com
articles.description: It is hoped a new plant could quadruple supplies by 2050 but industry warned progress can be slow.
articles.content:
The government hopes to boost the nuclear power industry with the biggest expansion of the sector in 70 years.
